name: Blooming Meadows (Online)
description:
A minimalistic puzzle about teamwork and flowers. Can be played as a local co-op, but does not have to.

Controls:

Player 1 : Arrow keys
Player 2 : WASD
Reset : R
Exit : Esc

Credits:

Made by Nicolaj Østerby @NicEastvillage for AAU Create Jam 2022 Spring edition. The theme was "cottage core + picnic".
